darkfire:AshSpray.NAME: Ash Spray
darkfire:AshSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies !M! times.

darkfire:BlindingFlame.NAME: Blinding Flame
darkfire:BlindingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !M! Weak on all enemies. Add 2 random flames to your hand.

darkfire:BurningForm.NAME: Burning Form
darkfire:BurningForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add !M! random flame to your hand.

darkfire:BurningShot.NAME: Burning Shot
darkfire:BurningShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and exhaust !M! random card in your hand.

darkfire:FlareStorm.NAME: Flare Storm
darkfire:FlareStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. Add [E] flames to your hand.
